logic

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.Map
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is the text based storage for the in game characters/objects locations on the current Game being played. It is here that collisions are detected and movement is allowed or not.
    Author:
    Jo√£o Vieira, Susana Lima
    See Also:
    Game, Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Map()
      Creates a Map with predefined size, using default Guard and default number of ogres.
      Map(char[][] newMap, boolean movableChar, boolean movableWeapon, boolean isLever)
      Creates a custom Map using newMap as reference for initial objects/characters positioning.
      Map(GuardPersonality guardPersonality, int level)
      Creates a default Map initialized on a specific level with given guardPersonality Guard.
      Map(int lvl)
      Creates a default Map initialized on a specific level.
      Map(int ogreNumber, int level)
      Creates a default Map initialized on a specific level with given ogreNumber number of ogres.
      Map(int width, int height, boolean isDefaultMap)
      Creates a empty custom Map with specified size.

      • Map

        public Map(int ogreNumber,
           int level)
        Creates a default Map initialized on a specific level with given ogreNumber number of ogres.
        Parameters:
        ogreNumber - the new value of ogreNumber
        level - the selected level

      • Map

        public Map(char[][] newMap,
           boolean movableChar,
           boolean movableWeapon,
           boolean isLever)
        Creates a custom Map using newMap as reference for initial objects/characters positioning. Additional information for enemies movability, and Unlocker is provided by the other parameters.
        Parameters:
        newMap - the reference array for map creation
        movableChar - the flag for non-Hero Character ability to move
        movableWeapon - the flag for non-Hero Character ability to move their Weapon
        isLever - the flag for Unlocker indication

      • Map

        public Map(int width,
           int height,
           boolean isDefaultMap)
        Creates a empty custom Map with specified size.
        Parameters:
        width - the width of this Map map
        height - the height of this Map map
        isDefaultMap - the flag for option verification

    • Method Detail

      • initializeMap

        public void initializeMap(int level)
        Selects which level will be loaded to this Map map.
        Parameters:
        level - the level to initialize

      • initializeMap

        public void initializeMap(char[][] newMap,
                          boolean movableChar,
                          boolean movableWeapon,
                          boolean isLever)
        Extracts info from newMap for objects/characters positioning and the other variables for Character specifications in order to define this Map map as a new custom level.
        Parameters:
        newMap - the reference array for map creation
        movableChar - the flag for non-Hero Character ability to move
        movableWeapon - the flag for non-Hero Character ability to move their Weapon
        isLever - the flag for Unlocker indication

        Parameters:
        o - the Ogre in analysis
        map - the reference for placement check

      • setGuardType

        public void setGuardType(GuardPersonality gp,
                         boolean move)
        Set the value of this Map Guard as a Guard specified on gp, with initial positioning on this Map map[y][x].
        Parameters:
        gp - the new value of this map guardPersonality
        move - the flag allowing(or not) the Guard to move

                                 int y,
                                 char c)

        Parameters:
        x - the location on this Map map[]
        y - the location on this Map map
        c - the new value of map[y][x]
        Returns:

        y - the location on this Map map

      • isWallColliding

        public boolean isWallColliding(Character c)
        Checks if Character c current position is the same as an impassable object.
        Parameters:
        c - the Character to check position
        Returns:
        true if overlapping, else false

      • isWeaponColliding

        public boolean isWeaponColliding(Character c)
        Checks if Weapon current position of Character c is the same as an impassable object or a Unlocker.
        Parameters:
        c - the Character whose Weapon is checked
        Returns:
        true if overlapping, else false

      • isExitColliding

        public boolean isExitColliding(Character c)
        Checks if Character c current position is the same as a Door.
        Parameters:
        c - the Character to check position
        Returns:
        true if overlapping, else false

      • hasReachedLever

        public int hasReachedLever(Character c)
        Checks if Character c current position is the same as a Unlocker.
        Parameters:
        c - the Character to check position
        Returns:
        Unlocker position on this Map doors, else -1
